title: Complete Resume Creation Flow
description: Test the full user flow from opening the application, completing all 6 form steps, selecting a template, verifying the real-time preview updates correctly, and exporting the resume to PDF.

steps.description: Open the Resume Builder application
Fill out Personal Details form with valid inputs and proceed to next step
Add multiple Education entries with valid data and proceed
Add multiple Work Experience entries with valid data and proceed
Enter Skills including technical and soft skills and proceed
Add optional Certifications, Projects, and References and proceed
Select a resume template
Check the real-time preview pane updates instantly with all inputted data
Export the resume to PDF
Verify the PDF exported matches the web preview layout and styling with no errors

title: Form Navigation and Data Persistence
description: Verify that users can navigate forwards and backwards through all 6 form steps and that data persists when navigating between steps and after page reloads.

steps.description: Fill out Personal Details form and navigate to Education step
Navigate back to Personal Details and verify earlier inputs still exist
Navigate forward through Experience, Skills, and Additional Information steps filling valid data
Reload the application page
Verify all previously entered form data is persisted and fields are populated correctly
Check the progress indicator reflects the correct current step after reload

title: Real-time Preview Updates
description: Ensure that any changes to form inputs update the preview pane within 100 milliseconds with correct data and styling.

steps.description: Modify personal details fields such as name and summary
Verify real-time preview pane updates within 100ms and accurately reflects the changes
Add a new education entry and update its institution name
Check preview updates instantly to include the new education data
Add a new skill and remove an existing skill
Confirm preview pane matches the updated skills list immediately

title: Template Selection and Data Preservation
description: Verify users can switch between the 5 different resume templates and that all form data persists while the preview updates instantly to the chosen template style.

steps.description: Complete at least one form step with valid data
Select the 'Modern' template
Verify preview updates to Modern template style and data displays correctly
Switch to 'Classic' template
Confirm all user data is preserved and preview updates instantly to Classic style
Repeat template switching through 'Minimal', 'Elegant', and 'Creative'
Check data persistence and instant preview updates for each template

title: High-Quality PDF Export Verification
description: Test that exporting the resume to PDF generates a file that matches the current web preview including multi-page support and accurate rendering of gradients and styles.

steps.description: Fill in sufficient content to require multi-page PDF output
Select a template with gradient styles (e.g., Modern or Creative)
Export resume to PDF
Verify PDF generation completes within 5 seconds without errors
Check PDF styling matches the web preview visually including gradients and multi-page layout

title: Auto-Save Functionality and localStorage Persistence
description: Validate that changes to the resume data are auto-saved to browser localStorage and persist across browser sessions, with graceful handling of localStorage errors.

steps.description: Enter valid data in various form steps
Reload the application page
Verify all entered data is restored correctly from localStorage
Simulate localStorage quota exceeded or disabled scenario
Confirm application handles storage errors gracefully without crashing and informs user if necessary

title: Comprehensive Form Validation
description: Check that form validation displays clear error messages for all required fields, incorrect formats, and invalid inputs, preventing progression to next steps until corrected.

steps.description: Leave required Personal Details fields empty and attempt to proceed
Verify appropriate validation error messages appear and user is prevented from proceeding
Input incorrectly formatted email or phone number
Confirm validation errors highlight the formatting problems
Test invalid dates or reversed date ranges in Education or Experience entries
Check validation messages are shown and prevent form submission
Correct all validation errors
Ensure user can proceed smoothly to next step

title: Dynamic Form Fields Add/Edit/Remove Functionality
description: Verify that users can smoothly add, edit, and remove multiple entries for Education, Work Experience, Skills, Certifications, Projects, and References with data persistence and accurate preview updates.

steps.description: Add multiple education entries with distinct data
Check all education entries render correctly in preview and form
Edit an existing education entry and save changes
Verify updated data is reflected in preview instantly
Remove an education entry
Confirm the entry is removed from form and preview
Repeat add/edit/remove tests for Work Experience, Skills, and Additional Info
Validate smooth operations and real-time preview synchronization for all dynamic fields

title: Responsive Design Layout Tests
description: Ensure the layout and UI components adapt correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes without horizontal scrolling or layout breakage.

steps.description: Open the Resume Builder on a desktop browser and verify the split view layout (form on left, preview on right) is correct
Resize the window to tablet dimensions
Check UI components rearrange properly and remain usable without horizontal scroll
Resize further to typical mobile viewport
Confirm form and preview panes stack or adapt gracefully with readable text and accessible controls
Navigate through all form steps in mobile view
Verify all form elements are accessible and functional with correct styling

title: Performance Testing for Input Lag and PDF Generation
description: Test that user input lag in the form and preview synchronization remains under 100 milliseconds and PDF generation completes within 5 seconds for typical resume data.

steps.description: Perform rapid input changes in various form fields such as name, education, and experience
Measure and ensure real-time preview updates within 100ms consistently
Fill resume data to require multi-page PDF export
Trigger PDF export
Verify that PDF generation completes within 5 seconds
